attributes.action: Set up a young offenders boot camp on the Shetland Islands
attributes.additional_details: Instead of pandering these feral inner-city rodents with youth clubs and young people’s detention centres - where it seems they do little other than play on video games and compare mugging techniques - the Government needs to set up a Sandhurst style boot camp to teach these pathetic children some basic manners, decent values and a work ethic. This ridiculous softly softly approach does not work and their parents are clearly incapable of bringing them up and teaching them anything. Get them up there and let them learn some decent human values.
